metadata.name: Protector #0001
metadata.description: Intuitively discerning the attack patterns, they blocked the blows without a quiver of fear! It was supposed to have been a simple mission: forage for useful items. Who could have guessed that waiting for them would be an enemy that sent chills down their spine. Covered in blood and raw flesh, only one person remained standing. Adrenaline coursing through, they tensed up, wound up. It was now or never. Well-aware of openings in its attack, they sliced and diced it savagely! Their foe shrieked & writhed around before falling to the ground, mangled, shredded. Inspecting their grazed arm, relief washed over them. This ordeal was over, they had survived. But there would be more. For they were pursuing Death itself.
